data.title: Why do black and white films often seem sharper and clearer than color films, even modern HD ones?
data.meta_description:
Answer (1 of 4): Interesting question got me thinking. There's no chromatic aberration to deal with in black and white images.

I never thought about it before. Is your eye continually adjusting focus a teeny bit as your attention moves between objects of different colors in any scene?

Could thi...
